column1: '''Kieron Elliott''' is a Scottish actor. He voicematched [[Billy Boyd]]'s role of [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Kieron Elliott]]|articleurl=http://www.kieronelliott.net/Voice%20Over/|articlename=Voice Over|dated=|website=www.kieronelliott.net|accessed=12 February
